List of Commands: 

1.Open Camera
2.Upload Image
3.Upload Document
4.read text again
5.Save as Text
6.Save as PDF
7.Go back

Open Camera:-Open the camera to capture an image

Upload Image:-Open the image picker interface to pick an image from device storage

Upload Document:-Opens the document picker interface to select a document to upload

Read Text Again:-Read the text again

Save as Text Document:-Save the text as document

Save as PDF:-Save the text as PDF

Go back:-Go back to home page
